As soon as the purple suited people attempted to dissolve into the crowd, you kept your eyes on them. You don't trust them or their fancy fireworks. You need to follow these people. So you do. You push your way through the crowd, fighting the erge to fall asleep.

You see the purple-dressed stranger you have been following take a turn down an alley. But the turn was in the direction of the docks, where their boat is.

Follow them into the alleyGo to the docks
